[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@elux/react-taro](./react-taro.md) &gt; [IStore](./react-taro.istore.md)

## IStore interface

Store实例

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IStore<TStoreState extends StoreState = StoreState> 
```

## Remarks

- 每个 Store 都挂载在 [IRouter](./react-taro.irouter.md) 下面，router 和 store 是一对多的关系

- 每次路由发生变化都会生成一个独立的 Store

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispatch](./react-taro.istore.dispatch.md) | [Dispatch](./react-taro.dispatch.md) | 派发Action |
|  [getState](./react-taro.istore.getstate.md) | [GetState](./react-taro.getstate.md)<!-- -->&lt;TStoreState&gt; | 获取有效状态 |
|  [getUncommittedState](./react-taro.istore.getuncommittedstate.md) | () =&gt; TStoreState | 获取未提交的未生效状态 |
|  [router](./react-taro.istore.router.md) | [IRouter](./react-taro.irouter.md)<!-- -->&lt;TStoreState&gt; | 每个 store 实例都会挂载在 router 路由器下面 |
|  [sid](./react-taro.istore.sid.md) | number | 每个 store 实例都有一个 ID 标识 |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [destroy()](./react-taro.istore.destroy.md) | 销毁，框架会自动调用 |
|  [mount(moduleName, env)](./react-taro.istore.mount.md) | 在该 store 中挂载指定的 module |
